results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = Dyson's rank of the k-th partition of n that does not contain 1 as a part, with partitions in lexicographic order.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..33, flattened
maple: else b(n-i, i, t+1); b(n, i+1, t)
if n<2 then 1 else l:= NULL; b(n, 2, 0); l fi
mathematica: T[n_] := Module[{b, l}, b[n0_, i_, t_] :=
Table[T[n], {n, 1, 13}]  // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 05 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
xref: The sum of row n is A000041(n-1). Row n has length A187219(n).
